general.name: window_unified
general.description: This file contains the list of polygons determining the primary area of the SDSS window function. The format corresponds to the mangle definitions of spherical polygons. For each polygon, this file reports the row in the window_flist.fits file corresponding to the primary field covering it.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: For IDL users, the idlutils utility "read_fits_polygons" can be used to read in this file into a format that the other idlutils mangle utilities (e.g. plot_poly or is_in_window) can read. It can be output as a standard ASCII mangle file with "read_mangle_polygons". Example file: window_unified.fits

header.comment: migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update

XCAPS.name: XCAPS
XCAPS.description:
direction on unit sphere of each cap
(see mangle documentation referred to above)
XCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

CMCAPS.description:
size of each cap
(see mangle documentation referred to above)
CMCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

IFIELD.name: IFIELD
IFIELD.description: field index (position in the window_flist.fits file) for the field we chose as "primary" within this balkan
